EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_SFCustomerDinner_Q314.Reminder to attend - Michael Khan
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Cocktail reception tonight 6:30-9pm at Town Hall
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re looking forward to seeing you tonight for the Pivotal Labs Cocktail Reception.
Along with yourself, we will be joined by a group of mobile & technology professionals in the Bay area from companies like First Round Capital, Google, Macys, Lyft, ENIAC Ventures, Core Logic and more. If you’d like to bring a colleague along, please feel free to do so.
Looking forward to seeing you this evening.
Time: 6:30-9 p.m. Location: Town Hall, 342 Howard St, San Francisco, CA Reservation under Pivotal Labs
Thanks! Michael
